title: How much does content writers earn for writing 1000 words? - Quora

response.answer_text: That’s a great question, if only because it’s so difficult to answer. If pressed for an answer, I’d say, “It depends.” It depends on five factors: Who you’re writing fo?—a boss in a content agency, a freelance client, or an employer? The type of firm also plays a role, i.e., a large firm, a small start-up, a self-employed professional, or a nonprofit.Your boss or client’s quality expectations. Are they looking for top-performing content that will establish them as thought leaders, or are they primarily looking for fresh content to maintain their visibility.Your experience and ability to efficiently provide helpful, relevant contact. Do you have a portfolio of published posts you can point to with pride?How much research will be required? Writing is just one of the tasks involved in blogging. You might also have to learn the terminology and language of a new industry, etc. Do you have to create or locate graphics to accompany the post? Can you submit the posts as text files, or do you also have to post the article on the client’s blog?Your long-term expectations and goals. Is writing blog content your primary goal, or are you just interested in a side project to work on evenings and weekends? Or, are you looking to become a content superstar able to command high fees?Your answers to the above questions should help you make the right decision. Your expectations and goals should play a big role in your decision. For example, in some cases, it might be worth writing for free, or low fees, to build up your portfolio and visibility in your area of specialization. providing guest answer. Does this help?

I am into content-writing since last 3 years and one thing I can tell for sure is number of words has very less to do with what you will be paid. What really matters is whom you are writing for, what the content is and how will that content be received. There are some people who pay $2-$5 ie Rs 100-Rs500 for 1000 words and there are some who the same for 500 words. There have been times where I have written content of approximately 2000 words and yet have received Rs 100 for the same. Basically, it all depends on whom you are writing for.
